name: [ imperfectus vocem ]
description:
~ imperfect voice ~
.
.
"if only I could listen to yesterday...
remembering all the pain...
beckoning all the innocence...

when hope is an illusion,
when trust is a prejudice in disguise,
when love is nothing more but lust...

yet they bring silence to my chaos...
my tears are incomplete..."
--160715
.
Graphite and colored pencils on paper, with digital alteration.
2300 x 2300 pixel.
